code: import{extendTheme}from"@chakra-ui/react";/***************************************************************/var config={initialColorMode:"dark",useSystemColorMode:false};/*********     COMPONENTS    ********/var UiPanel={baseStyle:{fontFamily:"EB Garamond",fontWeight:500}};var CardImagePanel={baseStyle:{fontFamily:"Beleren Bold",color:"black"}};var components={UiPanel:UiPanel,CardImagePanel:CardImagePanel};var theme=extendTheme({config:config,components:components});export default theme;
